note: cc106 - Export DV Lifestyle Kitchen Cabinets and Install
expression:
FOREACH $$choice$$ IN $$Choices/Cabinetwork/Cabinetwork - Style & Size$$ ,
    IF $$choice/item$$ == "Lifestyle 3.5m" OR $$choice/item$$ == "Lifestyle 4m" OR $$choice/item$$ == "Lifestyle 4.6m" 
    //need to get the room here to use IN $var
    //so can use IN $$Choices/Cabinetwork/Cabinetwork - Style & Size/$var/item
    THEN
        // Set variables
        $kitchensize = $$Choices/Cabinetwork/Cabinetwork - Style & Size/Kitchen/item$$
        $cabpanels = $$Choices/Cabinetwork/Cabinetwork - Cabinetry & Fixed Panels/Kitchen/item$$

        //Choose AND export Cabinets
        SWITCH($kitchensize,
            //3.5 kitchens
            CASE "Lifestyle 3.5m" 
                SWITCH($cabpanels,
                    CASE "DV Diamond White Gloss", 
                        EXPORT("106.130", 1, 106, 1, 1, "")
                    CASE "Two Tone Portland Ash/ Diamond White Gloss", 
                        EXPORT("106.170", 1, 106, 1, 1, "")
                EXPORT("each", 1, 106, 1, 1, "Kitchen Cabinet Colour not found")
                )
            //4m kitchens
            CASE "Lifestyle 4m" 
                SWITCH($cabpanels,
                    CASE "DV Diamond White Gloss", 
                        EXPORT("106.120", 1, 106, 1, 1, "")
                    CASE "Two Tone Portland Ash/ Diamond White Gloss", 
                        EXPORT("106.168", 1, 106, 1, 1, "")
                EXPORT("each", 1, 106, 1, 1, "Kitchen Cabinet Colour not found")
                )
            //4.6 kitchens
            CASE "Lifestyle 4.6m" 
                SWITCH($cabpanels,
                    CASE "DV Diamond White Gloss", 
                        EXPORT("106.110", 1, 106, 1, 1, "")
                    CASE "Two Tone Portland Ash/ Diamond White Gloss", 
                        EXPORT("106.165", 1, 106, 1, 1, "")
                EXPORT("each", 1, 106, 1, 1, "Kitchen Cabinet Colour not found")
                )
        )

    //Add INSTALL KITCHEN CUPBOARD (4.6,4.0 AND 3.5M)- INSC01
    EXPORT("106.810", 1, 106, 1, 1, "")
    ENDIF 
NEXT
